alert.note: Alert for Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:35AM CDT until June 14 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DELTA AND SOUTHEASTERN LAMAR COUNTIES... At 1135 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bogata, or 7 miles northwest of Hagansport, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paris, Blossom, Pattonville, Deport, Biardstown, Taylor Town, Clardy, Milton, Cunningham and Minter. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
